short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timetable manager for GTU students, this google chrome extension will help you find your timetable easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GTU - ცხრილი: Timetable Manager for GTU Students

This extension is designed specifically for students at the Georgian Technical University. This user-friendly tool enhances your experience by providing a seamless way to search your class timetable.

With an intuitive search interface, you can quickly find classes by entering keywords, making it easier than ever to navigate your schedule. The extension dynamically highlights relevant timetable entries, ensuring you have the information you need at your fingertips.
